column2: Title
As a Counter Staff, I would like the tickets to be color coded, so a quick glance can tell me the status.
As a counter staff, I want to access payment interface so I able to look how is payment interface look like.
As a manager of the bus ticketing system, only I  able to create, retrieve, update and delete on information about the bus, trip and route.
As a counter staff, I want payment system can insert discount so it able to rebate payment.
As a Developer, I need 4 tier object oriented programming with domain, database, control, UI so that I can encapsulate data and manage data flow with ease.
As a Counter Staff, I want seat selection to be reversible because customer changes their mind easily.
As a counter staff, I want payment system can calculate subtotal of price. Because it able to display price before tax and discount.
As a Driver, I want to have the schedules properly assigned to make sure there is no conflict on traveling.
column19: Manage schedule to make sure no clash of date and time
column21: Manage schedule to make sure no buses is assigned to a different places at the same date and time.
column23: Manage schedule to make sure no more than 1 driver is assigned to two different buses for traveling on the same date.

column2: As a counter staff, I want filter option such as source, destination and date in the trip selection page so that it is convenient to search for a particular location and date.
As a Driver, I want to view my past and future scheduled trip details in order to check where and when should I travels.
column19: Links up trip details to driver interface to allow access
column21: Allow drivers to reports for problem and decision making on future trip

column2: As a manager of the bus ticketing system, only I able to view the transaction, exception and summary report so that I  make the decision making on how to improve on my bus ticketing system and business.
As a counter staff, I want payment system can calculate GST amount so customer able to know how many of tax they require to pay.
As a Driver, I want to have access to view all the travel location the company have even though there is no assignment on me so that I can have a overview of where the company capable of travelling.
As a counter staff, I want payment system able to calculate grand total of price so customer can know how much they need to pay.
As a manager, I want the tickets to be refundable because customer might request for refund due to some emergencies.
As a manager, i want the system able to produce monthly and yearly report for the transaction and exception
As a counter staff, I want the trip details to be shown clearly so that the chances of making mistake is lower.
As a Counter Staff, I want visualize the seat position of the bus so customer can identify their seats easily.
As a Driver, i want to have filter to categorize the Ticket sold for the trip to see what I want to see.
As a Driver, I want to have my login page to be simple and clean so I can avoid mistake and slow reaction because I am not a good technology user.
As a counter staff, I want sorting for the trips in the trip selection page so that it is easier to view and identify the latest trip.
As a Counter Staff, I want payment system can insert amount paid from customer so I can give back customer changes money when customer paid more than grand total.
As Counter Staff, I want payment system able to display ticket and receipt after finish payment so customer can get their ticket and receipt for reference.
As a manager, i want to know about my employee information so that i can make arrangement on the timetable
As a manager of the bus ticketing system, I  able to put supervisor in each of the counter that I selected so that I able to have a better management control in each counter.
